data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea mariana (Black spruce) from sample NONAMUFE-131

Exposition E, Slope 15 deg, Geology: Fluvioglazialer Granit und Sand, av. Tree height 18 m, Tree cover 35%, Shrub cover 30%, Herb cover 80%, Moss cover 70%, Vegatation type: Lockerer PCMA-Bestand an Seeufer, Film number: 835A
